text: Vergil is a main character of Devil May Cry. He is a half-demon, son of Sparda and twin brother of Dante. He is a playable character in Devil May Cry 3: Special Edition, Devil May Cry 4: Special Edition and Devil May Cry 5: Special Edition. ==Portrayals== Vergil has been played by Daniel Southworth. title: Vergil (Devil May Cry)
